trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expose les types <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> à UI Automation.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Élément associé à cet homologue d’automatisation.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Réduit <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode définit le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> propriété `true`.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Un objet situé dans <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Crée <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> pour l'élément spécifié.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> qui est associé à l'élément spécifié.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Restaure <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode définit le <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> propriété `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'état, développé ou réduit, du contrôle qui est associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: L'état du contrôle associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le type de contrôle du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode est appelée par <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Valeur de l'énumération <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la collection d'éléments enfants du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode est appelée par <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Les éléments enfants de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> méthode retourne une collection de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> des objets qui représentent les <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, et <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> les objets qui appartiennent à la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le nom du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode est appelée par <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Le nom du type du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Énumération de valeur qui spécifie le modèle de contrôle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le modèle de contrôle du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si la propriété <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> est la valeur <see langword="false" /> et de <paramref name="patternInterface" /> est la valeur <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, cette méthode retourne un objet qui prend en charge le modèle de contrôle ; sinon <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui indique si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associé à ce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> est en dehors de l'écran.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> est réduit ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Cette API n’est pas implémentée.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui spécifie si le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> autorise que plusieurs éléments enfants soient sélectionnés simultanément.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> dans tous les cas.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ce membre est une implémentation d'un membre d'interface explicite.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Il peut uniquement être utilisé lorsque l'instance de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> est castée en interface <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtient une valeur qui indique si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requiert la sélection d'au moins un élément enfant.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> dans tous les cas.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ce membre est une implémentation d'un membre d'interface explicite.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Il peut uniquement être utilisé lorsque l'instance de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> est castée en interface <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
